summary: Diff focuses on frontend build configuration (Vite env handling) and provider wiring, plus added deployment notes. However, REQ-1â€™s acceptance criteria about capturing exact failure output and demonstrating a successful fresh build/deploy are not evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run the full build and deployment to the Internet Computer, and if deployment fails again, capture the exact failure output and apply the minimal code/config changes needed to make deployment succeed.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary contains code changes and a high-level explanation of an issue, but does not include the exact deployment/build failure output, nor any evidence (e.g., command output/logs) that a fresh build and canister install/upgrade completed successfully after the changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new project metadata/state tracking file (project_state.json) describing feature requests and issues.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for adding internal state/metadata files; it only requests fixing deployment/build failure with minimal necessary changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a frontend file inventory/summary file (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request generating or modifying documentation/summaries of frontend files; only deployment fix context was requested.
